024
025package io.blt.util;
026
027import io.blt.util.functional.ThrowingSupplier;
028import java.util.function.Consumer;
029import java.util.function.Supplier;
030
031import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
032
033/**
034 * Static utility methods for operating on {@code Object}.
035 */
036public final class Obj {
037
038    private Obj() {
039        throw new IllegalAccessError("Utility class should be accessed statically and never constructed");
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Passes the {@code instance} to the {@code consumer}, then returns the {@code instance}.
044     * e.g.
045     * <pre>{@code
046     * var user = Obj.poke(new User(), u -> {
047     *     u.setName("Greg");
048     *     u.setAge(15);
049     * });
050     * }</pre>
051     *
052     * @param instance instance to consume and return
053     * @param consumer operation to perform on {@code instance}
054     * @param <T>      type of {@code instance}
055     * @return {@code instance} after accepting side effects via {@code consumer}.
056     */
057    public static <T> T poke(T instance, Consumer<T> consumer) {
058        consumer.accept(instance);
059        return instance;
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Calls the {@code supplier} to retrieve an instance which is mutated by the {@code consumer} then returned.
064     * e.g.
065     * <pre>{@code
066     * var user = Obj.tap(User::new, u -> {
067     *     u.setName("Greg");
068     *     u.setAge(15);
069     * });
070     * }</pre>
071     *
072     * @param supplier Supplies an instance to consume and return
073     * @param consumer Operation to perform on supplied instance
074     * @param <T>      type of instance
075     * @return Supplied instance after applying side effects via {@code consumer}.
076     */
077    public static <T> T tap(Supplier<T> supplier, Consumer<T> consumer) {
078        return poke(supplier.get(), consumer);
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Returns {@code value} if non-null, else invokes and returns the result of {@code supplier}.
083     * <p>
084     * Optionally, the {@code supplier} may throw which will bubble up.
085     * </p>
086     * e.g.
087     * <pre>{@code
088     * private URL homepageOrDefault(URL homepage) throws MalformedURLException {
089     *     return orElseGet(homepage, () -> new URL("https://google.com"));
090     * }
091     * }</pre>
092     *
093     * @param value    Returned if non-null
094     * @param supplier Called and returned if {@code value} is null
095     * @param <T>      Type of the returned value
096     * @param <E>      Type of {@code supplier} throwable
097     * @return {@code value} if non-null, the result of {@code supplier}
098     * @throws E {@code Throwable} that may be thrown if the {@code supplier} is invoked
099     */
100    public static <T, E extends Throwable> T orElseGet(T value, ThrowingSupplier<T, E> supplier) throws E {
101        return nonNull(value) ? value : supplier.get();
102    }
103
104}
